name: Ultimate Catch!
description:
Play as an old man , who's mission it is to become the best fisherman ever!
Each day you will be given a new objective to complete and rewarded on completion.
At the docks you are able to upgrade your fishing gear to go even deeper into the ocean and catch bigger fishes!

Get lucky a find a mystery treasure chest for unqiue items!
The
game is getting lots of new updates feel free to give input and I'll
make sure it would be looked at to create a game you love!

Goodluck catching all the big fishes in the ocean!
